short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT in sidebar. You won't need to waste time swiching between ChatGPT and other tabs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
No wasting time anymore!
Use ChatGPT Sidebar to use ChatGPT in all tabs, instead of switching between browser tabs.

You need to have an OpenAI Account.
